library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)

## Read in the data

```{r}
palmetto <- read_csv(here("data", "palmetto.csv"), col_types = cols(.default = 'c')) %>% 
  mutate(height = as.numeric(height)) %>% 
  mutate(species = case_when(
    species %in% 1 ~ "Serenoa repens",
    species %in% 2 ~ "Sabal etonia"
  ))
```
